Cordelia Chase had at one time been referred to as the Bitch Queen of Sunnydale High. It was a position she had lost recently all because she had dated Xadner Harris. Xander Harris had cost her her place in society. And having dumped his loser ass she was no questing to return to the post of Bitch Queen. The going was not easy as her former 'friends' truthfully her loyal sheep had abandoned her when she had started dating Xander who was admittedly beneath her social status.

Not that her one time 'friends' would ever understand that Xander was something of a hero what with his secretly fighting vampires and demons once the sun went down saving the world for the whole human race. To them he was just the son of the town drunk who dressed badly and was weird, with weird freinds. All of whom had saved those same popular kid's lives several times over without any thanks.

At the moment distancing herself from Xander and his freinds hadn't helped her any. All she had to show for it was the new student following her around. Still a follower was a follower so Cordelia wasn't looking this horse in the mouth. And Anya was unaware of the full scope of Cordelia's relationship with Xander so Cordelia could bitch to her hearts content over the slights real or imagined that she had had while dating Xander.

"So what do you wish you could do to him?" Anya asked after Cordelia had finished ranting.

Cordelia didn't even stop to think she grinned evilly. "Oooh, I wish people could see just what kind of a mutant freak Xander really is. Like his freaky comic book freaks he always reading. I wish he looked on the outside like the mutant he is on the outside. That he couldn't mingle with us normal regular people without us knowing it on sight!"

"DONE!"

Cordelia looked up from her clenched hands to find that Anya had changed. Her face went from pretty to ugly, like someone had skinned her face and replaced it with demon's wrinkled visage. Eyes widening Cordelia realised she'd been talking to a demon all this time. A demon who'd just done something. Backing away Cordelia raised her hands in front of herself in defense and watched as the girl winked out of sight.

Across the school quad a scream rent the air as Xander Harris doubled over in pain. Those closest noticed that he seemed to be changing. Changing into something... changing into...

Shaking all over he tried to struggle to his feet but stopped as he caught sight of his hands through his eyes watering. They had swollen several sizes larger than they were normally. His finger's seemed to be stuck together in pairs of two giving him Star Trek 'live long and prosper' hands. He was just about to call out for help when pain sprouted in his mouth like someone was pulling his teeth out. He groaned in pain only to suddenly scream as he felt something break through the skin at the base of his spine. Dropping down to his hands and knees he tried to make his way to the school. He needed to get to the library, something bad was happening to him, something weird, he needed to see his friends. After all they dealt with weird on a daily basis, so they'd know what to do.

A kid close to him took one look at Xander and let out a shocked, "Whoa DUDE! I think your having an allergic reaction."

The girl he was walking with looked down at Xander and recoiled, "Fuck allergies! His eyes are yellow!"

Xander tired to pay attention to what they were saying but the pain was overwhelming his senses. It was a struggle to move onward. But he pushed through the pain. If he didn't reach the gang then he'd be dead meat. Because what was happening to him, what he was going through, was nothing natural and he was pretty sure it was going to kill him.

"Seizures." Giles said simply. "You began suffering from them."

Xander tilted his head and tried to think about it, he didn't remember anything. Closing his eyes he tried to fight through the exhaustion he felt to hear what else Giles had to say. Finally he gave a slow nod of his head.

"There were of course other changes. Your hair's grown, it's quite long now and it lays in the strangest fashion... comes to two peaks on each side of your head, a bit like horns I suppose. You developed muttonchops also. You've grown at least three inches and put on quite a bit of muscle mass, in the upper body especially. We'd like to gauge your weight change but I figured that would be best done once your were conscious. Your shoulders are quite a bit larger, as are your biceps and pectoral muscles. This of course would imply increased strength, naturally, but so much so that during your seizures the straps were insufficient to hold you during the seizures. You broke through them and both Buffy and Faith were required to restrain you. Apparently increased strength on par with a slayer's is part of your... transformation."

Xander grunted affirmatively and gave the muscles in his arm a tentative flex. Nothing felt different. The again was it really worth opening is eyes and the pain it brought to see exactly how swelled up he'd become. No, no it wasn't, he decided.

"Your ears have under gone a change. The tips of your ears have become pointed much like an elves. That appears to be the sole change. We'll test later to see if your hearing has improved. Also your teeth have changed. The canines in particular have enlarged themselves to resemble... well, fangs, I suppose is the only correct description."

Xander traced his teeth with his tongue and had to admit that yes, he now had fangs, not vampire fangs exactly but still fangs all the same.

"Curiously your arms have lengthened by four inches, this means your hands come to rest below your knees when your at rest which is- uh- I don't really know how to describe it outside of simian in nature." Giles pressed on, "Both your hands and feet have grown in size, as you would imagine what with everything else on you growing. It is, however, the size of this change that is vexing. Previously your feet were size ten, triple E width, yes?"

"Yuh.", Xander grunted affirmative. A bit curious how Giles knew that exactly.

"We had to remove your shoes as your growth was threatening to destroy them during the process." Giles answered. "Now I believe it's safe to say you'd be wearing a size thirty or so in a triple O width."

"Oh." Xander chuffed. He had feet bigger than Shaq's. Weird. But also neat. He idly wondered what that would do for his reputation with the ladies.

"Now imagine your hand as you know it as a fist, it's the size of a very large apple or orange correct?" Xander shrugged. This was more or less accurate, a little on the less side but effective for a mental picture. "Good, now imagine that your fist is the size of a very large melon. Cantaloupe or Honeydew, only larger which is not to say... a Watermelon. Do you understand what I'm trying to convey?"

Xander nodded slowly trying to imagine the size of his hands as he flexed his fingers into fists.

"Regretably this is the last of the subtle changes you've under gone."

Raising an eyebrow Xander cracked open an eye and looked at Giles who was ashen, with bags under his eyes and unkempt hair, his clothes rumpled and askew. Giles it seemed was not joking. Looking down at himself Xander was surprised to see that one he was naked and two he was blue.

Giles turned away as Xander screamed, "Yes, I see you've seen that you've turned blue. Also you seem to be covered in a fine fur... giving your skin a... well Buffy best described it as velvet covered feel."

With wide eyes Xander looked up at Giles in fear and shock.

"Unfortunately there is more." Giles said gravely, "You seem to have overlooked this but your fingers, the index and middle have merged together into one finger and the ring and pinky have merged together to form another finger. Leaving you with two very large fingers on each hand. Your thumb of course increased in size to match the other fingers sheer size. This was of course one of the first changes, before you hands had reached their apparent full growth. And as your hands grew so too did the size of your fingers.... They are quite large now."

Xander flexed his fingers, both hands in front of his face as he looked at the massive digits. A strangled whine passed his lips.

Giles sighed, "If it helps ease your mind Faith pointed out that your new, um, fingers were perfect for, uh, fooling around with young ladies who don't want to go all the way. They're apparently a suitable phallic replacement."

Xander looked up at the blushing Britton and tried to get his mind around what he was saying. "Dick hands?" he choked out.

"Something along those lines, yes." Giles said quickly.

"Your feet were also like affected." Giles seemed a bit distracted, "Well, not exactly like but similarly. All of your toes merged into only two toes, on both feet, however your heel has elongated and sticks out about an inch now, which is peculiar."

Xander was momentarily struck by how weird Giles was that elongated heels was the only thing he found peculiar in this situation. "Un huh."

"There is also the tail."

"Tail?" Xander shouted hoarsely. Of course his day was now complete. He had a tail!

"It's remarkable, you seem to have a fully oppossable tail. It's a classic devil's tail, actually. It runs from the small of your back down to your ankle... uh, we'll need to run some tests to see exactly what kind of control you have over it. I thought that we could d-" Giles noticed xander's glare and decided that it was better left for talking about tomorrow.

Looking away Giles went over the last item on his list of noticeable changes. "Then there is of course the situation with your genitals."

Xander choked then let out a strangled whine that almost went ultrasonic he grabbed for the sheet covering him, ripping free from the straps holding him down, looking down once the sheet was out of the way he saw that there were two. There were two. He had two sitting one on top of the other. One left, one right. He looked lower and was relieved to see that the family jewels seemed to larger than before, however there weren't two of them, so he'd take what he could get. Now he could make as many claims he wanted of having big balls and be proved right.

"Of course, when the swelling goes down we'll have a better understanding of exactly what the full extent of the transformation is." Giles said inoffenssively. After all he didn't want the boy to get his hopes up when his privates returned to their regular size.

"T-th-that is their, uh, I mean, um, that is normal size." Xander said softly.

Giles looked at the boy's face, noticed the distracted look and surmised the boy was telling the truth. Under his breath he whispered, "Lucky berk."

"Well, moving on."
